trans-unit.source: Sends a file or directory to the recycle bin.

seg-source.mrk: Sends a file or directory to the recycle bin.

target.mrk: Sends a file or directory to the recycle bin.

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The source path of the file(s) or directory to Recycle. (* and ? wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

seg-source.mrk: The source path of the file(s) or directory to Recycle.
(* and ?
wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

target.mrk: The source path of the file(s) or directory to Recycle.
(* and ?
wildcards accepted - See Remarks)

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: 0 (typically meaning the file is in use or does not exist).

seg-source.mrk: 0 (typically meaning the file is in use or does not exist).

target.mrk: 0 (typically meaning the file is in use or does not exist).

trans-unit.source: See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

target.mrk: See FileFindFirstFile() for a discussion about wildcards.

trans-unit.source: To remove a directory, simply give the path without a trailing backslash.

seg-source.mrk: To remove a directory, simply give the path without a trailing backslash.

target.mrk: To remove a directory, simply give the path without a trailing backslash.
